metadata.title: CVE-2021-3679 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A lack of CPU resource in the Linux kernel tracing module functionality inversions prior to 5.14-rc3 was found in the way user uses trace ring bufferin a specific way. Only privileged local users (with CAP_SYS_ADMINcapability) could use this flaw to starve the resources causing denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
